title: Sheared Railing
text: The metal is bent outward, not inward. Whatever went over the side didn't just fallâ€”it was pushed or steered with immense force.

title: Viscous Blue Fluid
text: It's cold to the touch. Even in the freezing wind, it doesn't solidify. It pulses when your hand gets near.

title: Echo of a Lullaby
text: The radio was playing 'The Lavender Field'. A song your mother sang to you. But the station has been dead for years.
